# This file was generated by FRUT's Jucer2CMake from "Keyboard.jucer"

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15)

project("Keyboard")

juce_add_plugin(Keyboard
  VERSION "1.0.0"
  BUNDLE_ID "com.socalabs.Keyboard"
  COMPANY_NAME "SocaLabs"
  COMPANY_COPYRIGHT "SocaLabs"
  COMPANY_WEBSITE "www.socalabs.com"
  COMPANY_EMAIL "info@socalabs.com"

  FORMATS
    "VST3"
    "AU"
    "Standalone"
    "VST"
    "LV2"
  PLUGIN_NAME "Keyboard"
  DESCRIPTION "Keyboard"
  PLUGIN_MANUFACTURER_CODE "Soca"
  PLUGIN_CODE "Keyb"
  NEEDS_MIDI_INPUT TRUE
  NEEDS_MIDI_OUTPUT TRUE
  IS_MIDI_EFFECT TRUE
  AAX_IDENTIFIER "com.socalabs.Keyboard"
  AU_EXPORT_PREFIX "KeyboardAU"
  AU_MAIN_TYPE "kAudioUnitType_MIDIProcessor"
  VST2_CATEGORY "kPlugCategAnalysis"
  LV2URI "https://socalabs.com/keyboard/"
)

juce_generate_juce_header(Keyboard)

target_compile_definitions(Keyboard
  PUBLIC
    JUCE_QUICKTIME=disabled
    JUCE_USE_CURL=0
    JUCE_WEB_BROWSER=0
    JUCE_MODAL_LOOPS_PERMITTED=1
    JUCE_JACK=1
    JUCE_REPORT_APP_USAGE=0
    JUCE_DISPLAY_SPLASH_SCREEN=0
)

target_sources(Keyboard
  PRIVATE
    "Source/PluginEditor.cpp"
    "Source/PluginProcessor.cpp"
)

set_target_properties(Keyboard PROPERTIES
    VISIBILITY_INLINES_HIDDEN TRUE
    C_VISBILITY_PRESET hidden
    CXX_VISIBILITY_PRESET hidden
)

target_link_libraries(Keyboard
  PRIVATE
    dRowAudio
    gin
    gin_dsp
    gin_graphics
    gin_gui
    gin_plugin
    juce::juce_audio_basics
    juce::juce_audio_devices
    juce::juce_audio_formats
    juce::juce_audio_plugin_client
    juce::juce_audio_processors
    juce::juce_audio_utils
    juce::juce_core
    juce::juce_cryptography
    juce::juce_data_structures
    juce::juce_dsp
    juce::juce_events
    juce::juce_graphics
    juce::juce_gui_basics
    juce::juce_gui_extra
    juce::juce_opengl
  PUBLIC
    juce::juce_recommended_config_flags
    juce::juce_recommended_lto_flags
    juce::juce_recommended_warning_flags
)


install(DIRECTORY "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/${PROJECT_NAME}_artefacts/${CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE}/LV2/${PROJECT_NAME}.lv2" DESTINATION "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ci/bin/lv2/" USE_SOURCE_PERMISSIONS)
install(DIRECTORY "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/${PROJECT_NAME}_artefacts/${CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE}/VST3/${PROJECT_NAME}.vst3" DESTINATION "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ci/bin/vst3/" USE_SOURCE_PERMISSIONS)
install(DIRECTORY "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/${PROJECT_NAME}_artefacts/${CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE}/AU/${PROJECT_NAME}.component" DESTINATION "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ci/bin/au/" USE_SOURCE_PERMISSIONS)
install(PROGRAMS "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/${PROJECT_NAME}_artefacts/${CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE}/Standalone/${PROJECT_NAME}" DESTINATION "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ci/bin/bin/")
install(PROGRAMS "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/${PROJECT_NAME}_artefacts/${CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE}/VST/lib${PROJECT_NAME}.so" DESTINATION "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/ci/bin/vst/")
